mapper.insert: INSERT INTO detection_instition_detail ( id, pid, scope, list_number, test_object, item_number, item_content, standard_or_method, note, item_state, institution_name, date ) VALUES (#{id},#{pid},#{scope},#{list_number},#{test_object},#{item_number},#{item_content},#{standard_or_method},#{note}, #{item_state},#{institution_name},#{date})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM detection_instition_detail did, detection_institution di WHERE did.pid = di.id
AND (did.institution_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR did.test_object LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
AND did.test_object LIKE CONCAT('%',#{key},'%')
AND di.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{province},'%')
AND did.institution_name =#{institution_name}
